title: Matching (1 point each)
instructions: Select the correct answer from the dropdown.

prompts.question: A roadmap describing how the game will be built, including tasks and dependencies.
The phase of development where the team primarily focuses on building the game.
A document that is created in pre-production that details how the game and its elements will be implemented.
Responsible for working out schedules and budgets to ensure that the game ships on time.
A Game Design Document should be a _____ document that evolves throughout the development process.
